statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment;
SELECT material, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT lifecycle_stage, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment WHERE material = 'Paper' ORDER BY packaging_id;
SELECT packaging_id, lifecycle_stage FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment WHERE carbon_footprint > 10;
SELECT * FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment WHERE recyclable = TRUE ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT packaging_id, material, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment WHERE material = 'Plastic' OR lifecycle_stage = 'Production'
SELECT * FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment WHERE carbon_footprint > 100 AND recyclable = TRUE ORDER BY material ASC
SELECT lifecycle_stage, AVG(carbon_footprint) AS avg_carbon_footprint FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment GROUP BY lifecycle_stage
SELECT packaging_id, material, carbon_footprint, recyclable, lifecycle_stage FROM packaging_lifecycle_assessment WHERE carbon_footprint < 50 ORDER BY packaging_id
SELECT * FROM packaging_solutions;
SELECT name, material FROM packaging_solutions WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT id, name, weight FROM packaging_solutions ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_tracking WHERE tracking_id = 1001;
SELECT packaging_id, location, status FROM packaging_tracking ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_solutions WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, material, weight FROM packaging_solutions WHERE material = 'Paper';
SELECT name, material, weight FROM packaging_solutions WHERE material = 'Plastic' AND weight BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_packages, material FROM packaging_solutions GROUP BY material ORDER BY total_packages DESC;
SELECT ps.name, pt.location, pt.status FROM packaging_solutions ps JOIN packaging_tracking pt ON ps.id = pt.packaging_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, recycling_score FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY recycling_score DESC;
SELECT product_name, usage FROM packaging_products WHERE usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM packaging_lifecycle WHERE disposal_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, material_name FROM packaging_products JOIN packaging_materials ON packaging_products.packaging_material_id = packaging_materials.id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, usage FROM packaging_products WHERE packaging_material_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND usage > 100;

SELECT packaging_materials.material_name, packaging_lifecycle.production_date FROM packaging_lifecycle INNER JOIN packaging_products ON packaging_lifecycle.product_id = packaging_products.id INNER JOIN packaging_materials ON packaging_products.packaging_material_id = packaging_materials.id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT packaging_lifecycle.lifecycle_stage) AS unique_stages FROM packaging_lifecycle;
SELECT * FROM packaging_products WHERE product_name LIKE '%box%' AND usage BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_solution;
SELECT id, solution_name FROM packaging_solution WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT solution_name, material_type FROM packaging_solution ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_lifecycle WHERE duration_days < 30;
SELECT package_id, impact_type, impact_value FROM packaging_impact WHERE impact_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM packaging_solution;
SELECT solution_name, material_type FROM packaging_solution WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT solution_name, material_type FROM packaging_solution ORDER BY material_type DESC;

SELECT p.solution_name, m.material_name, i.impact_value FROM packaging_solution p JOIN packaging_material m ON p.id = m.material_id JOIN packaging_impact i ON p.id = i.package_id WHERE i.impact_type = 'Environmental';
SELECT p.solution_name, l.lifecycle_stage FROM packaging_solution p JOIN packaging_lifecycle l ON p.id = l.package_id WHERE l.duration_days > 30 ORDER BY l.duration_days ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_solutions;
SELECT packaging_type, material_type FROM packaging_solutions WHERE lifecycle_stage = 'Use';
SELECT packaging_id, assessment_date, environmental_impact FROM lifecycle_assessment WHERE environmental_impact LIKE '%high%';
SELECT packaging_id, manufacturer_name, location FROM packaging_manufacturers JOIN packaging_solutions ON packaging_manufacturers.manufacturer_id = packaging_solutions.id;
SELECT center_name, location, contact_person FROM recycling_centers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM packaging_solutions WHERE packaging_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT * FROM packaging_manufacturers WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC
SELECT id, packaging_type FROM packaging_solutions WHERE material_type = 'Paper' AND lifecycle_stage = 'Production'
SELECT * FROM recycling_centers WHERE location = 'New York' AND contact_person = 'John Doe'
SELECT packaging_id, action_date FROM packaging_history WHERE action_description LIKE '%recycled%' ORDER BY action_date ASC
